Wagner White Hat Hacking

Our mission is to inspire with passion for Cyber Security and project this passion onto everything we do and offer. TRUST US and we will focus with a burning passion to find the needle in your NEEDLEstack!

Read More

My name is Florian Wagner, CEO and founder of Wagner White Hat Hacking. I worked as a Project Security Manager and Penetration Tester for Deutsche Telekom Security from 2016 to 2021. After this I decided to be an entrepreneur and founded my own Cyber Security Company, partnering with other security firms to continue deliver IT security services for their customers and my own. My experiences range from penetration testing of government applications over managing the security of big projects like the German Corona Warn App (CWA) and its European Federation Gateway Service (EFGS) to partaking in the IDM security standardization of projects within the GSMA. Wagner White Hat Hacking provides quality Cyber Security and Ethical Hacking Services. We helped businesses to identify, manage and fix thousands of Cyber Security vulnerabilities in various projects around the globe.
